oracle text:
1/3
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 green Plant creature token.
T: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever a Plant creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target Plant creature you control. If you do, that creature gains trample until end of turn.
